about_the_game:
The game is divided into two main modules: card design and online play

Card design

1.Design card templates: First, design a card template. On a blank card, you can place some picture elements and custom text elements. The role of the template is to determine the position, Angle and size of these elements.
2.Generate cards group：After the completion of a template design, you can generate one or more cards from the template, in the card group, you can generate multiple cards with the same template, and the element attributes in each card can be modified, such as: modify the picture, modify the color, modify the text, and set the number and ordering rules of each card
3. Save card set: Card template and card group together form a card set. After completing the design of all card templates and card group, click the Save button to save the whole card set. You can name your own card set。

Play online

Players can create a room, or join other players' rooms based on their room number, and can choose to create a room with their own saved or collected card sets, or with the game's pre-built card sets.
Inside the room, the homeowner decides to start, stop, and reset the game. There are multiple areas in the room to place cards, players can operate cards in each area, such as: from the card pool to touch cards, play cards, show cards, transfer cards and so on. There are no rules in the room, all actions are free, and players perform various operations according to the agreed gameplay.
Although your behavior is not restricted, it does not mean that you can cheat, as all your actions will be made public.
